name: Asian Food Quiz | Food & Drink | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Philippines.

	Biscocho is dried toast used to thicken meat sauces.

Japan.

	Naruto is a cylindrical fish cake covered with red, swirling designs...it's a type of kamaboko.

Myanmar.

	Ngan Pya Ye Chet is a Burmese fish sauce with onion, lemon grass, garlic and chili powder.

India.

	Saag is a spinach dish from India.

China.

	Ma Po Dofu is a spicy tofu dish from China.

Vietnam.

	Cha Gio is the Vietnamese name for spring rolls.

Korea.

	Bulgogi is a barbequed meat dish from Korea.

Taiwan.

	Chou Tofu is 'stinky tofu'. The smell is truly awful, but you can always find at a stand on the street corner.

Indonesia.

	Nasi Goreng is a fried rice dish very popular in Indonesia.

Thailand.

	Sangkaya is a Thai dessert, an egg custard baked inside the shell of a coconut.
